title: Canonical announces 12 year Kubernetes LTS | Canonical
author: Canonical Ltd; Canonical
description: Canonical unveils 12-Year Kubernetes LTS, enhancing enterprise software infrastructure security and simplifying operations
cntitle: Canonical 宣布 12 年 Kubernetes LTS | Canonical
cndescription: Canonical 发布 12 年 Kubernetes LTS 版本，增强企业软件基础设施安全性并简化操作
